mapper.select: select @seq:=@seq+1 as seq, userid, seqno, writer, title, to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as regdate, hitno from (select @seq:=0) a, tbl_board b where writer like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by seq desc limit #{startPoint},#{postNum}
select count(*) from tbl_board where writer like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (userid, writer, title, content) values(#{userid}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})

insert into tbl_file (seqno,userid,org_filename,stored_filename,filesize,checkfile)
values ((select auto_increment from information_schema.tables where table_name = 'tbl_board' and table_schema = DATABASE()), #{userid},#{org_filename},#{stored_filename},#{filesize},'Y')
values (#{seqno},#{userid},#{org_filename},#{stored_filename},#{filesize},'Y')
mapper.select: select org_filename, stored_filename from tbl_file where fileseqno = #{fileseqno}
select fileseqno, org_filename, filesize from tbl_file where seqno = #{seqno} and checkfile='Y'
select stored_filename from tbl_file where seqno = #{seqno}
select stored_filename from tbl_file where userid = #{userid}
select seqno, writer, userid, title, to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as regdate, content, likecnt, dislikecnt from tbl_board where seqno = #{seqno}
select ifnull(max(seqno),0) from tbl_board where seqno < #{seqno} and (writer like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
select ifnull(min(seqno),0) from tbl_board where seqno > #{seqno} and (writer like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
mapper.update: update tbl_board set hitno = (select hitno from tbl_board where seqno = #{seqno})+1 where seqno = #{seqno}
update tbl_board set writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} where seqno = #{seqno}
mapper.select: select mylikecheck, mydislikecheck from tbl_like where seqno = #{seqno} and userid = #{userid}
update tbl_board set likecnt = #{likecnt}, dislikecnt = #{dislikecnt} where seqno = #{seqno}
mapper.update: update tbl_like set mylikecheck = #{mylikecheck}, mydislikecheck = #{mydislikecheck}, likedate = #{likedate}, dislikedate = #{dislikedate}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (seqno, userid, replywriter, replycontent) values (#{seqno},#{userid},#{replywriter},#{replycontent})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replycontent = #{replycontent} where replyseqno = #{replyseqno}
